review: Hate to be all positive an glowy here - but ChromeCast does work, and works well. It is the ONLY way I can watch a few things - like HBO!  I also have a roku and a sony network media gadget in another location.If you have one of these, or are considering one - also get PlayOn. It works seamlessly with it, and it provides a very convenient way to locate and play almost ALL of the videos on the internet.Cut the cord - get a decent internet link and you are good. A somewhat speedy PC works also - mine is fast enough - but it slows a bit on some transcoding. PlayOn has a recommendation on their web site. And it doesn't have to be a pricey PC - just one with a FAST processor. That is especially true for the HD streaming.
